atk_abil: Normal Attack: Shoot 2 Dark Arrows at once causing slow and pushback effects.
Skill Attack: Nearby ranged units become silenced and unable to attack or use skills.
Special Ability: When Reviving, start at 2 % of the previously reached level. (applied consecutively).
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Shoot 2 Dark Arrows at once causing slow and pushback effects.
Skill Attack: Nearby ranged units become silenced and unable to attack or use skills.
Special Ability: When Reviving, start at 5 % of the previously reached level. (applied consecutively).

buffs.description: When Reviving, start at a percentage of the previously reached level. (not applied from Time Shop)(5-star 2%, 6-star 5%) For Example, if you previously reached staged 100 and you had 2 5-star Dark Archers and 3 6-star Dark Archers included in your team you would revive at stage 19.
buffs.name: Elevates the first Stage after the Revival
